name: part_007
file: tmp_【 #百鬼あやめ7周年新衣装3D 】百鬼あやめ７周年記念ライブ  ～天女繚華～ 【百鬼あやめ⧸ホロライブ】 [uRa-uLMea7w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Nakiri Ayame performs the ending of her song "Yume no Manimani".
Visual transition with cherry blossoms and stage reveal.
Nakiri Ayame, Ookami Mio, Shirakami Fubuki, and Sakura Miko perform "Nippon Egao Hyakkei".

subtitles.original: 夢もめくるめく 終いはよいよい
subtitles.english: Dazzling dreams too, the end is good.

subtitles.original: 君を連れて
subtitles.english: Taking you with me.

subtitles.original: 余りてなどか 頻ぞかなしき
subtitles.english: Why is it so lonely and overflowing?

subtitles.original: 身勝手なのが 世の理か
subtitles.english: Is being selfish the way of the world?

subtitles.original: 移ろわばこそ 心などどをも
subtitles.english: If things change, then even hearts and such...

subtitles.original: 忘るることなど あらざらむ
subtitles.english: ...will surely never be forgotten.

subtitles.original: よぉーっ！
subtitles.english: Yo!

subtitles.original: じゅげむ じゅげむ 五劫のすりきれ
subtitles.english: Jugemu, Jugemu, the sweep of five kalpas,

subtitles.original: かいじゃりすいぎょの すいぎょうまつ うんらいまつ ふうらいまつ くうねるところに すむところ
subtitles.english: Gravel and water-fish, mats of water-industry, mats of cloud-come, mats of wind-come, places to eat and sleep and places to live.

subtitles.original: やぶらこうじの ぶらこうじ
subtitles.english: Buried paths of yew trees,

subtitles.original: ぱいぽ ぱいぽ ぱいぽの しゅーりんがん
subtitles.english: Paipo, Paipo, Paipo's Shuuringan,

subtitles.original: しゅーっ！
subtitles.english: Shuu!

subtitles.original: しゅーりんがんの ぐーりんだい
subtitles.english: Shuuringan's Gurindai,

subtitles.original: ぐーりんだいの ぽんぽこぴーの ぽんぽこなーの ちょうきゅうめいの ちょうすけ
subtitles.english: Gurindai's Ponpokopii, Ponpokonaa, Chokyuumei's Chousuke!

subtitles.original: ちょいとお時間いただきます
subtitles.english: We'll take a bit of your time.

subtitles.original: ご清聴ください
subtitles.english: Please lend us your ears.

subtitles.original: 整いました！
subtitles.english: It's all set!

subtitles.original: 笑うこととかけまして お祭り野郎と解きます
subtitles.english: Comparing laughter with a festival enthusiast.

subtitles.original: おや？
subtitles.english: Oh?

subtitles.original: そのこころは？ そのこころは？
subtitles.english: And the answer is? And the answer is?

subtitles.original: どちらもハッピー（法被）になるでしょう
subtitles.english: Both will be happy (in a festival coat)!

subtitles.original: おあとがよろしいようで
subtitles.english: That's all for now.

subtitles.original: 笑おう 笑おう さあ笑いましょう こんな時代こそ 笑いましょう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh, let's laugh, let's all laugh together. In times like these, let's laugh.

subtitles.original: 笑おう 泣いたら負けだ やけくそ笑いましょう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh, if you cry you lose. Let's laugh with reckless abandon.

subtitles.original: 波乱万丈 すいもあまいも 乗り越えたあっぱれ日本人
subtitles.english: Ups and downs, bitter and sweet. Admirable Japanese who overcame it all.

subtitles.original: 笑おう どんな時でも なにくそ笑いましょう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh, no matter what happens. Let's laugh with a 'never give up' spirit.

subtitles.original: ぐわっはっは にょほっほ
subtitles.english: Gwahhaha! Nyohohho!

subtitles.original: 空気なんて読まずに笑っとけ
subtitles.english: Don't bother reading the room, just laugh!

subtitles.original: 笑顔！ 笑顔！
subtitles.english: Smile! Smile!

subtitles.original: 笑う門には福来たる！
subtitles.english: Fortune comes to those who laugh!

subtitles.original: えー 皆様 本日はようこそおいでいただきました
subtitles.english: Ahem... Everyone, thank you for coming today.

subtitles.original: ここで一席！
subtitles.english: And now, a story!

subtitles.original: ねずみの娘がお嫁に行って、じきに帰ってきたんでねずみのお母さんが、大変怒って
subtitles.english: A mouse's daughter went to get married and came back soon after, so the mouse mother was very angry.

subtitles.original: 「あんな、いいところへ おまえ嫁いで
subtitles.english: "You married into such a good family,

subtitles.original: 誰が嫌で 出てきたんだい？」
subtitles.english: who did you dislike so much that you left?"

subtitles.original: 「いいえ、だーれも嫌じゃないんですけど、
subtitles.english: "No, I didn't dislike anyone,

subtitles.original: ご隠居さんがやさしいんで、嫌なの。」
subtitles.english: but the old master was so kind, I hated it."

subtitles.original: 「優しいんなら結構じゃないかねぇ。」
subtitles.english: "If he's kind, isn't that wonderful?"

subtitles.original: 「でも、猫なで声ですもの。」
subtitles.english: "But he used a cat-like coaxing voice!"

subtitles.original: 忙しさに身を任せて
subtitles.english: Leaving yourself to the busyness.

subtitles.original: 消えていくだなんて
subtitles.english: To think things would just disappear.

subtitles.original: べらんめえ！
subtitles.english: Good heavens!

subtitles.original: 笑おう 笑おう 笑えなくても 笑うしかないでしょ 笑いましょう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh, let's laugh. Even if you can't, there's nothing to do but laugh.

subtitles.original: 笑おう 口角上げて ひたすら笑いましょう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh, raise the corners of your mouth. Just keep laughing.

subtitles.original: 鬼の乱 大飢饉さえ クリアして現代日本人
subtitles.english: Onin War, Great Famine... modern Japanese who cleared them all.

subtitles.original: 笑おう 未来永劫 ぐははと笑いましょう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh, forever and ever. Let's laugh with a 'guhaha'!

subtitles.original: 小娘のたわごとと切り捨てないで
subtitles.english: Don't just brush it off as a young girl's nonsense.

subtitles.original: しかめっつらなんか変な顔 笑顔を見たいから
subtitles.english: A frown is such a strange face. Because I want to see your smile.

subtitles.original: 笑おう 笑おう さあ笑いましょう こんな時代こそ 笑いましょう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh, let's laugh, let's all laugh together. In times like these, let's laugh.

subtitles.original: 笑おう 泣いたら負けだ やけくそ笑いましょう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh, if you cry you lose. Let's laugh with reckless abandon.

subtitles.original: 波乱万丈 すいもあまいも 乗り越えたあっぱれ日本人
subtitles.english: Ups and downs, bitter and sweet. Admirable Japanese who overcame it all.

subtitles.original: 笑おう どんな時でも なにくそ笑いましょう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh, no matter what happens. Let's laugh with a 'never give up' spirit.

subtitles.original: ひたすら笑いましょう
subtitles.english: Just keep on laughing.

subtitles.original: ぐわっはっは にょほっほ
subtitles.english: Gwahhaha! Nyohohho!

subtitles.original: 空気なんて読まずに笑っとけ
subtitles.english: Don't bother reading the room, just laugh!

subtitles.original: 笑顔！ 笑顔！
subtitles.english: Smile! Smile!

subtitles.original: 笑う門には福来たる！
subtitles.english: Fortune comes to those who laugh!
